content: {"name": "One Day At A Time (ODAAT)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients must have a referral (Hibachi) to access the Food First Pantry.\nCase Manager provide the card.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.odaatphilly.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2532 North Broad Street", "address_2": "", "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19132", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9921665, "longitude": -75.15516699999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 226-7860", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}]}
